hero.title: Their Hospitals Are Beyond Capacity.
hero.subtitle: Your Expertise is Their Lifeline.
hero.description: Jusur (جسور) is the Arabic word for bridges. Just because we cannot get physical aid into Gaza, it does not mean we cannot provide them support, bridging our knowledge to people who need it the most.
hero.agreementText: UK Doctors Agree*: Your remote guidance is currently the #1 most impactful intervention.
hero.descriptionLong: In Gaza, hospitals are overwhelmed, operating at over 350% capacity with a critical shortage of specialist doctors. Triage is happening, but without the right expertise to guide complex treatments, lives that could be saved are being lost. When physical aid cannot get in, knowledge is the most powerful resource we can send.
hero.disclaimer: *Based on a limited survey of consultant surgeons and general practitioners across the UK.

specialists.title: Why UK Medical Specialists Are Critical
specialists.remoteExpertiseDesc: UK doctors provide life-saving specialist guidance when local expertise is overwhelmed or unavailable.
specialists.immediateAccessDesc: Digital consultations bypass physical restrictions and blockade limitations to deliver urgent medical support.

challenges.title: Critical Challenges in Gaza Healthcare
challenges.complexTraumaDesc: Limited advanced surgical expertise for complex blast injuries
challenges.trainingDeficitDesc: Limited opportunities for continuing education and skill development
challenges.diagnosticLimitationsDesc: Lack of diagnostic modalities like pathology and advanced imaging
challenges.multidisciplinaryGapDesc: Lack of experts in some specialties which hinders the implementation of multidisciplinary coordinated team-based approaches to complex cases
challenges.connectivityIssuesDesc: Internet availability limited to few hours daily with low average speeds
challenges.deviceLimitationsDesc: Shortage of computing devices, solutions must work on basic smartphones
challenges.powerRestrictionsDesc: Electricity available almost only in hospitals or medical points
challenges.dataSecurityDesc: Patient privacy must be maintained despite infrastructure challenges
challenges.conclusionText: Your expertise can bridge the gap between critical need and life-saving care.

features.title: Platform Features
features.subtitle: Humanitarian medical technology designed specifically for Gaza's healthcare crisis.
features.emergencyConsultationDesc: 24/7 instant access to UK specialists for critical emergencies.
features.secureVideoCallsDesc: Encrypted video and chat between Gaza clinicians and UK experts.
features.expertMatchingDesc: Intelligent specialist matching based on medical expertise and availability.
features.medicalRecordsDesc: Secure patient data documentation and medical record management.
features.offlineAccessDesc: Works offline with limited internet - designed for Gaza's connectivity challenges.
features.arabicEnglishSupportDesc: Full multilingual interface with medical translation capabilities.

howItWorks.title: Simple, Secure, and Built for Impact
howItWorks.step1Desc: Securely verify your GMC credentials in minutes.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Set your availability for on-call pings, MDTs, or forum consults.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Provide life-saving guidance through our secure, low-bandwidth platform.

joinMission.title: Join the Mission to Save Lives in Gaza
joinMission.gazaClinicianDesc: Register for free, immediate access to verified UK specialists for emergency consultations. Requires referral code.
joinMission.ukSpecialistDesc: Volunteer your expertise to provide critical medical consultations when traditional aid channels are restricted.
joinMission.supportDesc: Can't provide medical expertise? Support our platform and help fund critical medical equipment for Gaza.
